FT01: Your Smart Assistant for Project Success
FD01: First Draft is your intelligent partner for building strong, AI-powered business plans.
FD02: Get a deep understanding of your project through a professional, AI-supported plan.
about_title: Turn your ideas into real, successful projects
FD03: Understand your numbers with smart financial analysis for every part of your business.
FD04: We guide you from idea to execution with a simple and confident roadmap.
hero_title: A Clear Vision, A Smart Plan
hero_subtitle: Your AI-powered assistant for professional project planning

questions.q4: Can I export my business plan?
questions.q6: What features are included in the free plan?
questions.q7: Can I collaborate with my team?
questions.q8: How does the AI assistance work?
questions.q9: What file formats can I import?

answers.a1: First Draft is a smart business planning platform. It helps entrepreneurs create professional business plans, manage goals and finances, and connect with a supportive community.
answers.a2: Just sign up for free, choose your industry and business type, and First Draft will guide you through creating your first plan step by step.
answers.a3: Absolutely. We encrypt your data and store it securely. Your information stays private, and we never share it without your permission.
answers.a4: Yes, you can export your plan as a PDF. This is included in all paid plans.
answers.a5: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, just contact our support team.
answers.a6: The free plan includes basic business plan creation, up to 3 projects, and access to our community features.
answers.a7: Yes, our Pro and Enterprise plans support team collaboration with real-time editing and commenting features.
answers.a8: Our AI analyzes your inputs and industry data to suggest improvements, identify potential issues, and help optimize your business plan.
answers.a9: You can import data from CSV, Excel, and PDF files. We also support integration with popular business tools.
answers.a10: Yes, we provide 24/7 customer support via email and live chat. Premium users get priority support with phone access.
